page.title: 15East Street Scheme, Bristol
page.content: Old people and people without cars could go to Asda and they wouldn't have to worry about getting knocked down. But we think that other shops like Fine Fare, Tescos and Sainsburys (supermarkets) might suffer and some of the small businesses might go bankrupt. I personally like the East Street Scheme. The rest of my family also think that the East Street Scheme would be a good thing to happen, if it happens. I think the public meeting was a very good idea. More than 100 people came to the meeting in Holy Cross school on June 20th l985, many people were worried about the diverted traffic being near their homes. Many people said "Why don't they just leave East Street alone?"
